PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Choose one or more types of alert notifications.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notifications Use Sound
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Check this box if you want to be notified with sound.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notifications Vibrate
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Check this box if you want your phone to vibrate when you are notified.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notifications Use Popup
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Check this box if you want to be notified with a popup window.

PreferenceCategory.android:title: Alert Parameters
PreferenceCategory.android:summary: These settings allow you to tailor your driving and stop time to suit your own driving pattern.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Stop Time in Minutes
EditTextPreference.android:summary: If you are stopped for this amount of minutes, you will receive an alert.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Driving/Stopping Simulation
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: With this setting on, the app will simulate your driving for a few moments, and then stopping. And it keeps cycling like this.
